translations: 截瘫病人，下身麻痹患者

sentences.sentence: A passenger was injured so badly he will be paraplegic for the rest of his life.
sentences.translation: 一名乘客受伤非常严重，他的后半生都将下身瘫痪。

sentences.sentence: When a young employee was left paraplegic and depressed after a car accident, Ella gave an office job and refused to let her drop out of college.
sentences.translation: 当一个年轻的雇员在一次车祸后截瘫且精神不振的时候，艾拉给了她一份办公室工作，并拒绝让她退学。

sentences.sentence: Or one in which you become paraplegic? Which would make you happier?
sentences.translation: 还是自己变半身不遂，哪个会令你幸福？
